title: 神奇宝贝
author: qq110meng
txt_content: 怎么设置玩家与玩家对战不让加经验       现在玩家和玩家对战会增加经验

replies.author: 伪笑
replies.txt_content:
# Determines ifplayer vs player battles give pokemon experience, no EXP gain in PVP when false
决定玩家与玩家对战后精灵是否会获得经验，当设置无效时，玩家对战后其精灵不会获得任何经验值
B:"AllowPVP Experience"=true
允许玩家对战获得经验值=生效（若是要改成无效，则删除true，改成false）

replies.author: moshimowang18
replies.txt_content: 配置文件里面可以修改！

replies.author: zhuiming
replies.txt_content:
MOD配置文件: pixelmon.cfg 里面按ctrl+f打开搜索。搜索下Experience.让后会找到
    # Determines if player vs. player battles give Pokemon experience. No EXP gain in PvP when false.
    B:"Allow PVP Experience"=true
把这里最后的true改成false之后保存重启下服务器就好了
